name: eerie-impulse
effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages.

flavor_text.x_y: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
